steps.name: Then  I click on sauce lab log in button
When  I select filter as "Price (low to high)"
And  I view my shopping cart
And  I remove item from cart
Then  I validate items in cart
And  I input my details as "Bee", "Fateema" and "123456"
Then  I validate order successful message
